subject: Investing
title: Monitoring Global Macro Trends
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Monitoring Global Macro Trends.

hook.text: Rising US rates in 2022 triggered capital flight from emerging markets worldwide. One data point, global impact.

buildup.text: Key global macro indicators: US interest rates, dollar strength, commodity prices, and manufacturing PMIs.

discovery.text: These four data points explain much of the variation in emerging vs. developed market performance.

twist.text: You don't need to predict macro trendsâ€”just understand how your portfolio responds to them and prepare accordingly.

climax.text: Build a dashboard with these indicators and check monthly. Let data, not headlines, guide your adjustments.

punchline.text: You don't need to forecast the world. Just understand the weather before you set sail.

quiz.question: Which indicator most affects emerging market capital flows?
options: US interest rates and dollar strength
